testcase.classname: US1800- There should be a page where Order Details can be seen
testcase.name: US_1802- Sections on the Order Details page must be seen
testcase.system-out: Given Open browser go to url "myUrl"........................................passed Then User clicks on the login link, enters "mail" and "password" and logs in..passed Then User clicks on dashboard link..........................................passed Then User clicks My Order section on dashboard page.........................passed Then User verifies that sections on the Order Details page appear...........passed Then User closes the page...................................................passed
